name: Poetic 12 in Black, White, Silver - Painted Wood Wall Art Abstract
description:
Modern Abstract Painting on Wood Squares Panels

'Poetic 12' in black white silver

Poetic: beautiful, dramatic, dreamy, epical, idyllic, imaginative, lyrical, odic, rhythmic, romantic... and an original work of art.

"Poetic Blocks" is an original one of a kind Beautifully Rich and Romantic collection of 12 individual wooden panels each with a unique abstract painting.

This particular custom collection is in blends of black, white, silver, and greys. The detail and character is even better in person!

-12 blocks, each approx 5.5 x 5.5 inches
-Rich, abstract blends of poetic color
-Rich thick high gloss finish
-Comes ready to hang and enjoy!

This artwork would be beautiful in a home or office. They come ready to hang for easy installation and can be hung in any order or configuration you prefer. 

The "Poetic Blocks" are conceptualized and handmade by me. First, I cut each block of wood and sand. I try to use repurposed or upcycled wood whenever possible.
Then I paint each box seperately a rich blend of layers of acrylic paints. No two are alike.
This collection has an outstanding shine and gloss. I finish each block, using my own technique, with thick high gloss lacquer glaze. The end result is a spectacular finish or color, richness and shine ----just beautiful!

The photos just do not do the detail justice.

This listing is for a beautiful original custom sculpture collection of 12 pieces in the color scheme shown. Since all of my work is handmade no two collections or blocks are ever exactly the same. The ultimate product is unique, organic, and truly one of a kind! Your blocks each will look very closely similar to the ones shown with the same colors and tone. However. of you prefer that I make color adjustment to include, exclude or emphasize certain colors just let me know and I would be happy to accomodate you. 

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. 

CUSTOM ORDERS: Want a different color scheme? or different number of blocks? or size of blocks? no problem - I can work with you to create the collection that is right for you. Just drop me a message. I do a lot of custom orders working with clients for just the right collection for their space! (residential and commercial)


Thanks so much!
Rosemary

Rosemary Pierce Modern Art

name: Lyrical Circles order for Joni
description:
This is a custom listing for Joni ---if you are intersted in a similar work of art, just drop me a message and I will be happy to work with you.  (rosemary@artbyrosemary.com)  :-)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

'Lyrical Circles' is an Original Beautifully Detailed Abstract Mixed Media comprised of 28 individual art boxes with circles.

The Lyrical Series is made by a lengthy process of painting multiple layers of paint onto pressed board circles; beautiful rich blends of color; then my own unique technique creates a thick coat of clear gloss lacquer over each circle bringing out the color and depth of each unique piece and making for a tremendous shine and finish. I attach the circles each to a small block of wood painted black. I drill holes in the back of each block for easy display by simply hanging each one on a small simple nail. The block gives the circles incredible depth and dimension, giving the effect that circles are almost free floating, suspended from the wall. It's a beautiful and fascinating effect. 

The detail is so much greater in person. Spectacular color and character that photos just can't do justice.

The 28 Circles can be hung in any pattern or order you prefer. 

This listing is made to order. I am happy to accomodate any color preferences you have in mind or can make suggestions based on pics of your space or other inspirations items you like. I have made it in a variety of color combinations. If you do not have specific preferences, then I will make your collection very closely similar to the one you see displayed using the same tones and color emphasis. 

Turnaround time is usually 2-3 weeks; depending on weather conditions as it can affect the curing time on the final coats of high gloss lacquer. I will stay in touch with you and keep you posted regarding the proress and expected ship out date. :-) *If you need expedited service or need a rush on your order, please just contact me and we can make arrangements.

-28 pieces, each 4 x 4 x 1.5 inches
-Vibrant colors and intricate detail
-Rich thick high gloss finish
-Ready to hang and enjoy
-Can be hung in any order or pattern you prefer.
-will be shipped via Fedex

Thanks so much!
Rosemary

name: Sculptpural Pieces of Life No3
description:
'Sculptural Pieces of Life No3'
sculptural mixed media wall art
24 x 24 x 2.5 inches

Sculptural Pieces of Life
by Rosemary Pierce-Lackey

This is part of a series of   wonderfully colorful modern geometrics created entirely from recycled scraps of     paper, books, magazines, junk-mail, reclaimed wood, and consumer packaging.

Each piece is hand-cut by me, individually applied and layered on the wood, and completed with multiple layers of incredibly rich high gloss lacquer.  

The Pieces Sculptural works have an unexpected and unique 3-dimensional quality.  Almost as an optical illusion, the beholder may be surprised that some of the pieces appear to be literally coming forward, revealing further complexities of the pattern.

Itâ€™s a personal statement about my view of life.  It is complex, wildly colorful, and the most meaningful life has unpredictable and unexpected experiences.

Truly unique and one of a kind!

Our life experiences are a series of events in motion, each layering up another and creating incredible complexity, character and depth. Our experiences blend creating a kaleidoscope of colorful life, vibrant, rich, and unique. This series is all about capturing a look at life experiences; appreciating the motion, complexity, unpredictability, and beauty of letting go and living fully.

This original wall sculpture is eye catching and intriguing ---makes you want to study it closer and closer to absorb all the complex composure of color - thick paints appear to be almost still dripping and mixing down the wooden sticks. An incredible amount of paint is used on this piece to give it this depth and intricate character. A laborous process ---but so worth it for the results of the final product.

This sculpture is composed of repurposed wood pieces, each hand painting various colors then assembled as one piece. Then a laborous process of days of layering paints to create the complicated and very striking patterns of color. This piece has great movement and vibrancy! A wonderful and truly unique modern sculptural statement for your home or office wall.

name: Symphony no8 - mixed media on wood
description:
Symphony no8
mixed media on wood
24 x 24 x 3.5 inches


The Symphony Series
by Rosemary Pierce

The Symphony Series of original artworks utilizes the repurposing of discarded old books.  

Each geometric design is unique and is made spontaneously 
without a  predesigned layout.  This allows me to let the art 
itself reveal its final identity.  

The lengthy process of involves repurposing old book pages  
(circa 1951 in this case), painting multiple layers of paint over 
each torn page, cutting in various sizes and shapes, gluing each piece to painted wood,  finished by multiple layers of thick high 
gloss lacquer. 

A tedious and timing consuming experience, it a revelation in the ability for life to play in perfect symphony when we release our 
preconceived ideas.

Thanks so much!

:-) Rosemary


Rosemary Pierce Modern Art

name: Round and Round no5
description:
'Round and Round No5 is spectacular original modern mixed media artwork!

The Round and Round Series was inspired by a mood of free flow whimsy.
Do you remember the merry go round when you were a kid? The feeling of no worries, carefree, release to the moment.
'Round and Round' represents that feeling of capturing joy within the complex intricate details of life and experiences.

Incredible detail and depth. Thick, rich and fascinating texture, complexityand depth - incredibly intriguing one of a kind original art. Impossible for photos to capture the magnitude of the texture and detail.

Round and Round is a very intense labor of love and intensity. A very physical and time intensive experience, I hand layer and 'sling' all of the paint freely, in other words no spinning machine or other instruments are used, just my arms and hands, as I stand on a ladder over the piece and physically apply the paint from a distance above. I spend hours and days layering the complexities by free movement allowing each Round and Round piece to reveal its unique character and identity. Its an incredibly physical and labor intensive experience, but one I find worth it for the satisfaction of the uniqueness of the final results.

- on recycled wood handmade box
- 24 x 24 inches
- vibrant rich complex layers of color
- high gloss finish
- ready to hang and enjoy
- truly a one of kind original work of art

If you have any questions, feel free to email me.

CUSTOM ORDERS: I can also work with you to create a CUSTOM artwork with your color preferences and space in mind. Custom requests are always welcomed (and popular). I have done Round and Rounds in a large variety of sizes and colors for both home and corporate orders.

Thanks so much!

:-) Rosemary

name: Custom Colors Lyrical Circles Wall Sculpture
description:
'Lyrical Circles' is an Original Beautifully Detailed Abstract Mixed Media comprised of 28 individual art boxes with circles.

Each of the 28 circle has its own unique character. No two are alike.

A very striking 3d collection! Could be a wonderful addition to your home or office.

This listing is made to order with the color pallette you prefer.  Let me know what colors you would like to emphasize or remove, as well as your desire for the overall feel and tone.  I will be happy to work with you to create something very special.  I can send you a photo before I finish glazing to ensure you are happy with the color blends and make any adjustments as necessary to complete the final work so that you are sure to be happy!  :-)

The Lyrical Series is made by a lengthy process of repurposing old book pages (circa 1951 in this case), painting multiple layers of paint over each torn page, cutting and applying individual paper paintings onto pressed board circles; then my own unique technique creates a thick coat of clear gloss lacquer over each circle making for a tremendous shine and finish. I attach the circles each to a small block of wood painted black. The block gives the circles incredible depth and dimension, and also gives the effect of the circles being suspended from the wall. It's a beautiful combination.

The detail is just lovely and the workmanship is gallery quality. Spectacular color and detail that photos just can't do justice.

The 28 Circles can be hung in any pattern or order you prefer. You could hang them with specific grid, or you could hang them in a random pattern. Have fun with it! Express yourself with display. 

Turnaround time is usually 10-14 days; depending on weather conditions as it can affect the curing time on the final coats of high gloss lacquer. I will stay in touch with you and keep you posted regarding the proress and expected ship out date. 

-28 pieces, each 4 x 4 x 1.5 inches
-Vibrant colors and intricate detail
-Rich thick high gloss finish
-Ready to hang and enjoy
-Can be hung in any order or pattern you prefer.

If you have any questions, feel free to convo me. 

CUSTOM ORDERS: Like this design but prefer a larger number of circles or want a different color scheme? no problem, just drop me a note. I have made these in a variety of ways for different clients ---up to 70 circles in a collection, so I would be happy to work with you!

Thanks so much!
Rosemary

name: 3 Lines by 3 - featured by West Elm
description:
FEATURED BY WEST ELM Catalogue Summer 2011

'3 Lines by 3' is part of a series of modern and sophisticated contrasting lines. 

This dramatic one of a kind artwork is comprised of 3 wooden boxes, each measuring 7 inches x 7 inches and 2 inches thick. 

The boxes have an architectural beauty to them with their constructed square shape protruding from the wall along with the clean lines drawing the eye to consider.

The boxes are made of wood. The lines show the beautiful natural wood which is quite dramatic against the thick, bold, rich, glossy black lacquer. A thick coat of high gloss is glazed over each box for a fantastic almost glassy finish.

These are a beautiful collection and can be hung in any order or configuration you prefer. They would make a stunning statement to your home or office.

-3 wooden boxes, each measuring 7inx7inx2in
-beautiful contrast between natural wood and rich glossy black
-wonderfully glossy almost glass like finish
-ready to hang
-can be hung or free stand on a shelf or table
-very versatile, the open back of the boxes make them flexible to display from any side you prefer. allowing you to create the pattern and configuration that is most striking to you. It also makes it easy to change them around or turn them on a different side to create a completely different feel and statement.

These modern and dramatic boxes are a unique work of art conceptualized and hand crafted by me.

If you have any questions please feel free to contact me.

name: Trees Revealed in 3 - Your Color Choice
description:
'Striped Trees Revealed in 3'
is a vibrant modern abstract textural painting on wood.

52 x 24 inches

You can have these beautiful Trees in Your Color Choice! This listing is for a custom work of art like this one is your color choice. You can pick from the colors show or select any color that you prefer. If you want to pick one of the colors shown, simply indicate your color choice in the "note to seller" portion on the order at the end. You can also drop me an email and discuss your color preferences and I will confirm back with you to be sure we are on the same page for selection :-)

The 'Revealed' Series is a lengthy process of combinations and layers. 

Multiple layers of stripes in black and silver were handpainted on the large white painted wooden panel. Movement of lines across the piece give interest and depth.

Then a free-hand pattern was created and covering and creating my trees. I use my own unique technique of glazing the piece in rich color, allowing the background lines to gently show through the vibrant color, adding great depth and interest. The pattern of flowing trees is 'revealed." The whole piece is covered in a high gloss lacquer for tremendous shine. The final step adds depth and texture to the piece when I outline the trees in a clear raised textural paint. A subtle but rich affect. Even so much better in person! 

It makes for a wonderfully dramatic, rich, and glossy one of a kind work of art!

The 3 wood panels can be hung apart or together. Photos really can't do justice to the detail of the subtle striping effect that shows through the red. Truly a one of a kind original work of art for your home or office.

This piece has the hardware and wire installed and is ready to hang and enjoy!

Custom orders are usually completed within 10 days and ship out via fedex.

name: Striped Trees Revealed through Red - Large Textural Painting on Wood
description:
'Striped Trees Revealed through Red' is a large vibrant modern abstract textural painting on wood.

The 'Revealed' Series is a lengthy process of combinations and layers. 

Multiple layers of stripes in black and silver were handpainted on the large white painted wooden panel. Movement of lines across the piece give interest and depth.

Then a free-hand pattern was created and covering and creating my trees. I use my own unique technique of glazing the the pieces together in high gloss chinese red lacquer, allowing the background lines to gently show through the red, adding great depth and interest. The pattern of flowing trees is 'revealed.' The whole piece is covered in a high gloss lacquer for tremendous shine. The final step adds depth and texture to the piece when I outline the trees in a clear raised textural paint. A subtle but rich affect.

It makes for a wonderfully dramatic, rich, and glossy one of a kind work of art!

The piece measures 24in x 48in and is ready to hang.


Feel free to email me with any questions.

name: Lyrical Circles in 52 for RAINA IN ATLANTA - original wall sculpture installation
description:
CUSTOM ORDER FOR RAINA in ATLANTA
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
'Lyrical Circles' is a One of a Kind Beautifully Detailed Abstract Mixed Media comprised of 52 individual art boxes with circles.

Each of the 52 circle has its own unique character. No two are alike.

The Lyrical Series is made by a lengthy process of repurposing old book pages (circa 1954 in this case), painting multiple layers of paint over each torn page, cutting and applying individual paper paintings onto pressed board circles; then my own unique technique creates a thick coat of clear gloss lacquer over each circle making for a tremendous shine and finish. I attach the circles each to a block of wood painted black.  The block gives the circles incredible depth and dimension, and also gives the effect of the circles being suspended from the wall. It's a beautiful combination.

This large custom wall sculpture installation collection for Raina will be made with the combination of some very warm colors:  a chocolate, deep orange, brownish red. etc. . . as well as muted yellow tones and some off white and the blend of complimentary tones for a dramatic blend of color, dramatic depth, and a truly unique and remarkable artistic statement.


Thanks so much!

name: Trees Revealed on Black - Large Textural Painting on Wood
description:
'Striped Trees Revealed through Black' No1 is a large vibrant modern abstract textural painting on wood.

The 'Revealed' Series is a lengthy process of combinations and layers. 

Multiple layers of paint start with rich red, then handpainted white stripes, on a large wood panel. Movement of lines across the piece give interest and depth.

Then a free-hand pattern was created, covering and creating my trees. I use my own unique technique of glazing the piece in high gloss lacquer allowing the background lines to show through the glossy black, adding great depth and interest. The pattern of flowing trees is 'revealed.' The whole piece is covered in a high gloss lacquer for tremendous shine. The final step adds depth and texture to the piece when I outline the trees in a clear raised textural paint. A time intensive labor that creates a subtle but incredible affect.

It makes for a wonderfully dramatic, rich, and glossy one of a kind work of art!

The piece measures 24in x 48in and is ready to hang.


Feel free to email me with any questions.

I can also work with you to create a custom work of art in the colors, sizes, etc. that you prefer.

Thanks so much!
Rosemary

name: Blocks of Color - 28 Colorful Wood Blocks Wall Art
description:
Even on the cloudiest day Color like this on a wall can't help but brighten and enrich any room!

28 individual Sculptural Wood Blocks each painted a separate and unique different color. No two are alike.

Color Blocks No1  is a dramatic and vibrant artistic statement that is a one of a kind work! 

Each wood block is first hand-cut (by me) and sanded. After the blocks are cut and prepared, I hand paint each block with a beautiful, rich blend of colors going from dark to light variations of Red, Yellow, Green, and Blue. Then I use my own special technique for creating a thick high gloss lacquer coating---making a remarkable and unique finished product.

Spectacular vibrance ---the photos just can't capture the beauty of the variety of color.

The blocks are:
Dark Crimson Red to light red
Orange/Red to Yellow/Orange
Marigold to Light Yellow
Purple to Dark Blue
Royal Blue to Aqua
Aqua to Sky Blue

The blocks can be arranged in any order you prefer.

You could display them from dark to light (as seen in photo) or mix it up for a fun and cheerful color combination (as seen in other photo).

The blocks are EASY to hang ----AND to change!
Each block has a strip of magnet attached to the back. I will send you matching strips of magnet with adhesive backing to attach to the wall. This allows for easy installation AND flexibility. You can easily play around with the colors - you could even regularly change the display for a constantly changing and fantastic work of art.

'Color Block No1' is really an amazing and unique sculptural artwork for your home or office. 

-28 blocks, each 2.5"x2.5"
-can be hung close together or far apart
-can be hung in any order or pattern
-can easily be installed AND changed
-Vibrant, rich color
-Thick high gloss finish
-Comes with easy installation magnets (and instructions)
-Each block is numbered on the back so if you want to display it dark to light or vice versa, its already numbered in order for you. 
-All of my artwork is signed and dated and comes with a Certificate of Authenticity.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. 

I can also work with you to complete a CUSTOM work specially for you with your preferences for colors, size, shape, etc. Really the color spectrum and size of the blocks is unlimited. 

Thanks so much!
Rosemary
